Analysis & Offer

Owner: BA

Even before an offer goes out to a client or a contract is signed, a lot of steps have to be taken to ensure the budgets and deadlines are realistic, and product quality can be assured.

  • Sending Quotations

Sending Quotations#

  • Creating quotation should be done using our estimate template ↗
  • Estimates - whenever possible - should be done by at least two team members using planning poker.
  • Estimates should be made for the following activities:
    • Specification
    • Wireframing
    • Design
    • Sitebuild
    • Development (broken down into subtasks of no more than 8 hours)
    • Automated testing
    • Code reviews
    • Data migration
    • DevOps
    • Documentation (do they require up-to-date class diagrams / data models / api docs?)
    • Manual testing
    • PM
  • Estimated hours for each development subtask should fit in slots of 1, 2, 4, 8 hours
  • Estimate should be transformed into quotations, using our quotations template [HU] ↗ [EN] ↗

When estimating, take into consideration what the team will look like, what their competencies are and if they require extra time to learn a new tech stack.

Resources#

  • Estimates template ↗
  • Quotations template [HU] ↗ [EN] ↗
